body: $GOOG $AAPL $QQQ $SPY $TSLA    Who is positioned for the dump?
$AMZN  $2,400 at best, it's solely relying on investment income as growth now.. like we said businesses only grow to a certain point,, and then plateau $SPY $AAPL $AMD

$FSR Henrik has stated that Tim Cook didn't get back to him about the $AAPL car so he decided to go directly to Foxconn and call it the PEAR. However, there's no denying the long list of coincidences that link Fisker to Apple. I used to argue against them, but more and more lately I feel like the companies will somehow be connected. And now the Fisker Ocean is in a T-Mobile commercial. Same T-Mobile that has had a partnership with Apple for 15 years. https://www.ispot.tv/ad/b1Y_/t-mobile-for-business-what-i-want 🤔🍎🤷‍♂️🍐🔜↗️✅

symbols.title: Fisker Inc - Ordinary Shares - Class A

links.title: T-Mobile for Business TV Spot, 'What I Want'
links.description: There's a lot that goes into making a company successful and these employees have no problem singing a musical to express their desire for what they want. From the factory floor where products are made to the office space where logistics are handled, the employees at this company all rely on T-Mobile's 5G network to keep them connected to each other and to ensure that everything runs smoothly.

source.name: iSpot.tv | Realtime TV Advertising Performance Measurement

links.title: What Forced Pegatron to Suspend Production in Shanghai?
links.description: Pegatron and other companies from China have to cope with various challenges created by the Covid-19 outbreak in the country. Apple's iPhone assembler suspended production in Shanghai as well as the nearby city of Kunshan amid strict Covid-19 prevention measures. It is the latest hit to Apple, which recently announced a number of new products including a budget iPhone.
